headline: Chevron & Exxon are down this year: What to do with each stock
summary: Exxon (XOM) and Chevron (CVX) stocks have slumped over the past year as both companies navigate weaker oil (CL=F, BZ=F) prices and diverging capital strategies. CFRA research energy equity analyst and deputy research director Stewart Glickman breaks down the outlook for each stock. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.
